main event: Capt. Jerald Cravens, USAF, observed unusual aerial phenomena in Albuquerque, New Mexico on October 6, 1953.
interesting points: The observation was made at 1912 MST,There were multiple reports of unusual lights traveling to the north,The lights were described as having a dark reddish color,The sighting was part of Project Blue Book investigations,There were confirmations from other witnesses about similar phenomena in the area.
witness description: Capt. Jerald Cravens and additional unidentified observers
